name: Multi-Operator RAN
summary: This feature allows for two Baseband units that belong to different operators to share

parameters.name: SectorCarrier.configuredMaxTxPower
parameters.description: See MOM description.  For the Multi-Operator RAN feature, the valid range is limited by the power                 configuration set by the other LTE node.

parameters.name: SectorEquipmentFunction.availableHwOutputPower
parameters.description: See MOM description.  For the Multi-Operator RAN feature, the sector power shown by this attribute is the                 total power available for the different LTE nodes sharing radio.

activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4011512 MO instance.
deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4011512 MO instance.
